name: Puzzle Block Wild Free
description: Puzzle BlOCK WILD Free the most popular blast game, Full of challenges and fun! Come to an exciting adventure in the world of Puzzle Block WILD Free! Solve puzzles and win levels to get tons of rewards and prizes! Tap to crush 2 or more adjacent cubes of the same color, 5 or more create boost. When more than 5 cubes are taped to crush, a powerful bomb will be created. Bringing you a fresh experience. Let's relax and enjoy yourself in the big blast adventure of toy cubes, blast the cubes. Game Features: Fun and fresh gaming experience to enjoy. Over 89 levels, easy and fun to play but challenging to master. A puzzle game that will relax your brain. Play anywhere without internet & WIFI. Simple operation & excitement challenges. How to Play: Swap and match more than 2 identical toy cube to crush. Make special toy combos to help you crush special objects. Collect the boosters to help in tricky levels. Gather target items to win before you run out of moves Solve all kinds of puzzles in the journey. Install now and enjoy! Easy game play and rules. Magic Inspector.
